title: Farm work: equipment maintenance. Ep. 1. Reconditioning a mower (cutter bar)
creator_credit: Calvin Productions and United States. Office of Education
brief_description: How to check and repair the cutter bar mechanism of the mower. How to remove and replace worn sections in the sickle; how to sharpen the sickle sections; how to replace and adjust the knife clips and wearing plates; how to align the ledger plates; how to adjust the cutter bar for proper lead; how to adjust the sickle for register.
